#----CODE----

#input
N = int(input())
A_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

#finds the max diff between two elements
def find_max_diff(A_list):
    max_diff = 0
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(i+1, N):
            diff = A_list[j] - A_list[i]
            if diff > max_diff:
                max_diff = diff
    return max_diff

print(find_max_diff(A_list))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lmin = a[0]
    rmax = a[-1]
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        ans = max(ans, max(a[i] - lmin, rmax - a[i]))
        lmin = min(lmin, a[i])
        rmax = max(rmax, a[i])
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
